Hospital.WareHouse

Class Stock<I extends Item>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.WareHouse.Stock<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of items in this stock
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FoodStock

    public class Stock<I extends Item>
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimeObserver
    A stock of a specific type of items

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stock

        protected Stock(int maxStock,
     OrderPlacer o,
     I prototype,
     TimeSubject timeSubject)
         throws ArgumentConstraintException,
                ArgumentIsNullException
        Constructs a new stock with capacity maxStock and OrderPlacer o.
        Parameters:
        maxStock - The capacity of the Stock.
        o - The OrderPlacer used to order new stock
        prototype - the prototype of items in this stock
        timeSubject - the timeSubject to observe for changes
        Throws:
        ArgumentConstraintException - If maxStock is negative or 0.
        ArgumentIsNullException - if o is null

        Returns:
        the capacity of this stock

      • getFreeStock

        public int getFreeStock()
        Returns the number of unreserved items.
        Returns:
        The amount of items that are contained in this Stock and are not reserved.

      • getItems

        public java.util.ArrayList<I> getItems(ItemReservation reservation)
                                             throws ItemNotReservedException
        This method is used to remove a reserved item from the stock.
        Returns:
        a reserved item
        Throws:
        ItemNotReservedException - If the item is not reserved

      • reserveItem

        public ItemReservation reserveItem(int count,
                          Time execTime)
                            throws NotEnoughItemsAvailableException
        Reserves count items.
        Parameters:
        count - the amount of items to reserve
        Throws:
        NotEnoughItemsAvailableException - there were not enough non-reserved items in this stock at the given time

      • removeReservation

        public void removeReservation(ItemReservation reservation)
                       throws ItemNotReservedException
        Removes the reservation from an amount of reserved items.
        Parameters:
        count - the amount of items to de-reserve
        Throws:
        ItemNotReservedException - there were not as many items reserved as were given
